User Input: I'm struggling to focus on my studies.
Expected AI Response: I understand! Let's try the Pomodoro technique: 25 minutes of focus, then a 5-minute break.

User Input: Can you help me set a study schedule?
Expected AI Response: Of course! What subjects are you focusing on? I can create a weekly plan for you.

User Input: I keep procrastinating. Any advice?
Expected AI Response: Try setting smaller goals. Just start with 5 minutes of work. Momentum will follow!

User Input: Give me a motivational quote.
Expected AI Response: Sure! 'The secret of getting ahead is getting started.' – Mark Twain.

User Input: I need help understanding Newton’s laws.
Expected AI Response: Absolutely! Newton’s First Law states that an object in motion stays in motion unless acted upon by an external force.

User Input: Can you test me on world history?
Expected AI Response: Sure! Who was the first President of the United States?

User Input: I just completed my daily workout!
Expected AI Response: Great job! Keep the momentum going. What's your next fitness goal?

User Input: How do I build a morning routine?
Expected AI Response: Start with a few key habits: Wake up at the same time, hydrate, exercise, and plan your day.

User Input: Remind me to study at 6 PM.
Expected AI Response: Got it! I’ll remind you to study at 6 PM every day.

User Input: How do I stay motivated for the long term?
Expected AI Response: Focus on your 'why.' Keep a journal tracking your progress, and celebrate small wins.
